XT共享ZB独立完整的数字货币企业化服务Z.cn: XT共享ZB独立完整的数字货币企业化服务，该服务正在服务着全世界超过15家数字货币业务公司，是世界上唯一以链的方式支持众多数字货币充值、存储以及提现的企业化服务，绝大部分支持多重签名的货币都以统一的链的形态安全分散地技术服务，核心步骤采用断网方式处理，真正的安全来源与技术。
XT共享ZB独立完整的数字货币企业化服务Z.en: XT enjoys the independent and complete cryptocurrency business service of ZB, which is now serving over 15 cryptocurrency business companies worldwide, and the only business service which supports recharging, deposit and withdrawal of many cryptocurrencies in the form of block chains. Most of currencies supporting multiple signatures are safely distributed in the form of unified block chains to provide technological service. The core steps adopt an offline mode, which offers the really secure technology.

XT交易平台上提供多样化的币种Z.cn: XT交易平台上提供多样化的币种。采用优质项目共享的方式，XT优先上架ZB.COM平台的创新币种。同时，XT作为支持更为丰富的优质币种的上币交易的平台，XT将采用创业板的上币规则，以“累计充值人数排名”的上线机制，按照各创业版支持币种的充值帐户数进行排名，累计排名靠前的币种，将获得在XT首发开通交易的资格。
XT交易平台上提供多样化的币种Z.en: A variety of cryptocurrencies are delivered at the platform of XT. Firstly, XT presents innovative cryptocurrencies at ZB.COM in a way of sharing quality projects. In the meanwhile, as a cryptocurrency trading platform which supports more quality currencies, XT will follow the rule of listing on the exchange in GEM (growth enterprise market) with the mechanism of “accumulative recharging individuals ranking”, and conduct the ranking according to the number of deposit accounts of cryptocurrencies backed by GEMs. Cryptocurrencies dominating the top ranks will obtain the qualification to first release and exchange at XT.

XT致力于依托ZB.COM的技术体系X.en: XT is committed to building a widely inter-connected exchange alliance worldwide based on the ZB.COM technology system. XT itself is also the flagship in terms of the cryptocurrency exchange platform.

团队持有并解冻(不流通).cn: 团队持有并解冻(不流通)

ZB团队经过5年的发展Z.cn: ZB团队经过5年的发展，锻炼出了一支非常有战斗力的团队，积累了宝贵的经验，我们一直以来兢兢业业，努力提供最好的服务，最大可能地坚守自己的价值底线，现在，是时候展露我们年轻态的一面，XT全新定位于轻盈快捷的全球化交易平台，XT不仅在技术上是ZB的集大成者， 也在经营理念上，有众多的创新。
ZB团队经过5年的发展Z.en: During five years of development, ZB team has grown as a strong and energetic group and accumulated valuable experience. We work conscientiously to provide the best service, adhering to our value baseline. Now, it’s time for us to show our energy as a young team. XT aims at becoming a lightsome and rapid global trading platform with ZB’s technical support, achieving numbers of innovations in business philosophy.

作为ZB的兄弟品牌Z.cn: 作为ZB的兄弟品牌，XT将独立运营，但同时会打通与ZB的客户以及资金联系，成为ZB战略版图中最重要的一个补充；
作为ZB的兄弟品牌Z.en: As a sub brand of ZB, XT will operate independently, and build up contacts with ZB customers and funds at the same time, as the most important supplement in ZB strategic map.

一、XT免费支持数千种数字货币的上线交易.cn: 一、XT免费支持数千种数字货币的上线交易
一、XT免费支持数千种数字货币的上线交易.en: 1. Thousands of digital currencies can be listed for free at XT

XT 将全面支持基于ETH、EOS、QTUM等Z.cn: XT 将全面支持基于ETH、EOS、QTUM等的数千个Token，按照上线公示排名，每日排期对接排名前3的币种进行上币，快速将社区活跃的币种交易带给市场，同时，当交易足够活跃的时候，会自动评审，推荐到ZB.COM主交易区，也用于接受ZB.COM主交易区下架的币种，相信XT将很快成为支持上千个币种的交易平台。
XT 将全面支持基于ETH、EOS、QTUM等Z.en: ETH, EOS, QTUM and other thousands of tokens could be available for exchange at XT. The TOP 3 tokens of daily online deposit ranking, will bring the active community token trading to market rapidly. While the token exchange is active enough to trigger the assessment, the token will be upgraded to the main exchange zone of ZB.COM. XT will accept the tokens pulled off the shelf of ZB as well. We believe XT will soon become an exchange platform available for thousands of tokens.

二、XT拥有全新升级的技术、安全与服务体系.cn: 二、XT拥有全新升级的技术、安全与服务体系
二、XT拥有全新升级的技术、安全与服务体系.en: 2. New technology, security and service system at XT

XT是基于ZB团队研发的第七代Z.cn: XT是基于ZB团队研发的第七代技术产品，继承了原来交易系统的安全等优点的同时，全面支持联盟交易平台的搭建，我们分离了币的充值、提现、冷存储等体系，用户、交易、资金也全面分离，也做到了开发的前后端分离， 每一块都有独立团队改进研发与支持，这使得业务可以更加专注于产品与服务，而不用投入和管理高风险的技术板块；同时XT还将支持在线编程系统，能高度在线编辑与协作，可以快速支持全球交易联盟伙伴，我们独创了应用服务容器、 静态服务资源服务器、分布式缓存、分布式安全控制等可能涉及到安全的方方面面，对于技术的执著与追求，远远超越业务本身的需求希望带给您完全不一样的服务，我们定位自己为技术驱动型公司。
XT是基于ZB团队研发的第七代Z.en: XT is the seventh-generation technology products developed by ZB team. It inherits the security advantages of original exchange system and fully supports the construction of the alliance trading platform. We have separated the recharging, cash withdrawal and cold storage of tokens. Users, transactions and funds are also completely separated, and the development front-end and back-end separation have been achieved. Each part has an independent team to improve R&D and support, which enables the business to focus more on products and services without throwing into and managing high-risk technology modules. Meanwhile, XT will also provide online programming systems, to realize online editing and collaboration, which can support global trading alliance partners rapidly. In all aspects of security and those probably involved, we have creative technology in application service containers, static service resource servers, distributed caching, distributed security controls, etc. The persistence and pursuit for technology are far beyond the needs of business and expected to bring you extraordinary and unique services. Just as our positioning, it should be a technology-driven company.

三、XT平台积分ZT.en: 3. ZT -- the platform point at XT

ZT是XT的平台积分，持有ZT可以通过交易.cn: ZT是XT的平台积分，持有ZT可以通过交易挖矿ZT，获赠甚至超过100%的手续费；ZT目前基于ERC2.0开发，总数5亿枚，1.5亿枚为平台持有，3.5亿枚通过ZB换码并锁定投放，除换码结束后一次性释放换码池20%（平台持有并解冻的200万用于营销）外，其余每日解锁 当日交易手续费的ZT（等比例），解锁的ZT可以投注到交易挖矿矿池，用于加速挖矿返还比例，上限为当日交易手续费的1000%；
ZT是XT的平台积分，持有ZT可以通过交易.en: ZT is the platform point at XT. ZT holders can exchange and mine ZT to gain even more than 100% of service fees. Now, ZT is developed based on ERC2.0 with a total of 500 million, 150 million of which are held by the platform, 350 million of which are exchanged by ZB and locked. In addition to unlocking 20% of the Token Exchanging Pool once after the end of token exchange (Platform will unlock the same proportion and use 2 million for marketing promotion), the remaining part will be unlocked gradually each day with an amount equivalent to the daily transaction service fees. The unlocked ZT could be invested into the mining pool for the ZT return rate, with a maximum up to 1000% of the daily transaction service fees.

ZT将作为XT运营的核心枢纽.cn: ZT将作为XT运营的核心枢纽，用于计算、奖励系统用户，支撑业务
ZT将作为XT运营的核心枢纽.en: As the core hub of XT operation, ZT will be used to calculate and reward system users and support the business.

交易即挖矿，奖励比例最高至1000%.cn: 交易即挖矿，奖励比例最高至1000%
交易即挖矿，奖励比例最高至1000%.en: Trans-fee mining with a maximum reward up to 1000%

网站收益的100%均用于交易Z.en: All revenue will be used for trans-fee mining and other reward, 10% of which will be destroyed (the amount of ZT must exceed 100 million). Many mining rewards are waiting for you.

XT采用POW+POS的交易挖矿Z.cn: XT采用POW+POS的交易挖矿模式，交易时，当投入加速池的ZT越多，挖矿速度越快，上不封顶，总额占比80%，详细计算规则见详情列表。
XT采用POW+POS的交易挖矿Z.en: XT adopts POW+POS trans-fee mining mode. The more ZT you put into speeding pool when trading, the faster the mining will be without a limit, with a proportion of 80% in total amount. See detailed calculation rules in the list.

每日手续费的前10名Z.cn: 每日手续费的前10名，均分该奖励池的奖金，每24小时发放一次，占比总收益的15%。
